name: Blow 'Em Out Your Hatch
description:
Please enjoy this painstakingly crafted 4-Player Local Cooperative Game Experience...

FROM YOUR DEEP SPACE DEEP SLEEP TANK YOU HEAR THE SHIP COMPUTER:

"Unidentified Life Forms Detected On Board"

"Blow Them Out The Hatches"

"Keep Consoles Repaired"

"Charge the Escape Pod"

"Good Luck"

YOUR TIME IS NOW. WILL YOUR SPECIES SURVIVE... OR PERISH?

Controls & Stuff

  • Analog Stick or WASD - Zip Around
  • Controller Btn or SPACEBAR - Do Space Fish Crimes
